name: minecraft-debugger
description: Debug your JavaScript code running as part of the GameTest Framework experimental feature in Minecraft Bedrock Edition.

mode.description: The debugger connection mode. Use 'listen' to have VSCode wait for Minecraft to connect. Use 'connect' to have VSCode attach to a Minecraft instance that is listening for a debugger.

localRoot.description: The local root of the Minecraft Add-On scripts folder.

sourceMapRoot.description: The location of the source maps.

generatedSourceRoot.description: The location of the generated source files (js). Not required if same as source maps.

inlineSourceMap.description: Whether or not source maps are embedded in the generated source files. Overrides sourceMapRoot and generatedSourceRoot when true.

host.description: The host address the extension will connect to.

port.description: The port Minecraft is listening on.

inputPort.description: Prompts for a port at launch.

moduleMapping.description: Module mapping for imports. Each key is an import name that will be mapped to the provided value. Used if modules are external (i.e. included as part of minecraft). Defaults to an empty object.

configurationSnippets.label: Minecraft Debugger: Attach
configurationSnippets.description: A new configuration for attaching JavaScript debugger to Minecraft.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
